value:
$WmMPID_ナンナ,ch07_03_Nanna_F_Normal,Face|It's incredible to think about us
training with such large forces at
our disposal, Lord Leif.$k$p$WmMPID_リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_M_Normal,Face|Truly. I never would have imagined
anything like this back when it was
just the three of us on the run.$k$p$WmMPID_フィン,ch07_04_Fin_M_Normal,Face|Yet here you are, Lord Leif, and with
my full confidence in your command.
Now, shall we begin?$k$p
